FuncDef: This command monitors egress statistics for LDP FEC prefixes.

ParaDef.Info: Values-ipv4-prefix|a.b.c.d, ipv4-prefix-le|0 to 32, ipv6-prefix|x:x:x:x:x:x:x:x (eight 16-bit pieces), |x:x:x:x:x:x:d.d.d.d, |x: [0 to FFFF] H, |d: [0 to 255] D, ipv6-prefix-le|0 to 128.
Configures the interval for each display in seconds. Values-3 to 60. ParamDefault: Default- 10
Configures how many times the command is repeated. Values-1 to 999. ParamDefault: Default- 10
Displays raw statistics, without processing. No calculations are performed on the delta or rate statistics.
Displays rate-per-second for each statistic instead of the delta.
